data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 2, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta just outside Juventus's area.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi misses with an attempt on goal.
Juventus have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Atalanta's Matteo Pessina is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Cristiano Ronaldo of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 5, Daniele Doveri awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 7, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Juventus.
Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Daniele Doveri signals a Atalanta throw-in in Juventus's half.
Juventus are coming forward and Alvaro Morata gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 15, Juventus push upfield but Daniele Doveri quickly pulls them for offside.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atalanta's Duvan Zapata gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 22, Attention is being given to Atalanta’s Cristian Romero and play has been suspended briefly.
The match at Allianz Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Arthur, who is down injured.
Atalanta’s Cristian Romero is on his feet again at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 25, Juventus's Arthur looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Daniele Doveri waits before resuming play because Arthur for Juventus is still down.
Adrien Rabiot (Juventus) has replaced the possibly injured Arthur at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Juventus.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Federico Chiesa scores to make it 1-0 at Allianz Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Rodrigo Bentancur.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 31, Juventus to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atalanta drives forward and Duvan Zapata gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 33, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Juventus's area.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 36, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 37, Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Cristian Romero (Atalanta) has received a first yellow card.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
Ruslan Malinovskyi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Ruslan Malinovskyi's finish is wide of the goal.
Daniele Doveri awards Juventus a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Matteo Pessina's finish is wide of the goal.
Juventus have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus advance rapidly upfield but Daniele Doveri blows for offside.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Allianz Stadium.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 46, Adrien Rabiot (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Atalanta's Berat Djimsiti attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 47, Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juventus pushes forward through Alvaro Morata, whose finish on goal is saved.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Pierluigi Gollini, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 51, Pierluigi Gollini for Atalanta is back on the field again.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Juventus in the half of Atalanta.
Marten De Roon is booked for the away team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Juan Cuadrado, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 53, Gian Piero Gasperini is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Stadium with Papu Gomez replacing Matteo Pessina.
Juan Cuadrado is back on his feet again.
Adrien Rabiot (Juventus) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Atalanta at Allianz Stadium.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Remo Freuler grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
An attacking Juventus player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Juventus's Alvaro Morata has been booked in Turin.
In the minute 61, Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Alvaro Morata of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 63, Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Matthijs De Ligt gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Atalanta defence.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Daniele Doveri signals a Juventus throw-in in Atalanta's half.
In the minute 65, Atalanta's Robin Gosens misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 68, The match at Allianz Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ruslan Malinovskyi, who is down injured.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi is back in action after a slight knock.
Juventus drive forward but Cristiano Ronaldo is judged offside.
In the minute 71, Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) has taken off Ruslan Malinovskyi who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Aleksey Miranchuk is the replacement.
The away team have replaced Duvan Zapata with Luis Muriel. This is the third substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
In the minute 73, Cristian Romero (Atalanta) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Juventus defenders.
In Turin, Remo Freuler of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Important block from the Juventus defence as Hans Hateboer fires in a strike for Atalanta.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Throw-in for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, Daniele Doveri awards Juventus a goal kick.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a second substitution, with Alex Sandro replacing Federico Chiesa.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Atalanta to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
In the minute 79, Juventus's Danilo gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Juventus drives forward and Weston McKennie gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 80, Weston McKennie (Juventus) gets a yellow card.
Daniele Doveri awards the home team a throw-in.
Papu Gomez of Atalanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 83, Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paulo Dybala is replacing Alvaro Morata for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 85, Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Juventus.
Juventus drive upfield and Paulo Dybala gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Atalanta.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atalanta will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juventus.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Daniele Doveri will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Cristiano Ronaldo is back on the pitch.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Juventus.
Daniele Doveri awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Daniele Doveri signals a Atalanta throw-in in Juventus's half.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Daniele Doveri blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Attention is being given to Juventus’s Cristiano Ronaldo and play has been suspended briefly.
